version_description:
- Icon change
- Minor bug improvements

- Minor bug fixes
- Performance enchantments

- Brand new logo
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated Tor engine
- Minor bug fixes
- Performance improvements

- Onion now supports "pluggable transports" like obfs4 and meek, which improve connection support in locations that try to block Tor. 
- Added built-in bridges for obfs4, meek-amazon, and meek-azure -- same the official Tor Browser Bundle and Orbot.
- User-agent spoofing strings updated to the most recent browser versions.
- Tor updated to 0.2.8.6, the first stable release in the 0.2.8 series. This version contains several performance and security improvements.
- OpenSSL updated to 1.0.2h.

- iOS 10 support
- Refined new icon

We have great news to announce for our Russian users.
Now Onion is fully localised in Russian language!

Thank you for using Onion.

- Tor updated to version 0.2.9.7-rc
- OpenSSL updated to version 1.0.2j
- Libevent updated to version 2.1.7-rc
- Performance improvements
- Brand new icon
- 3D touch quick actions added for your convenience

- Tor updated to v0.3.0.9, Libevent v2.1.8-stable and OpenSSL v1.1.0f
- Brand new refined icon
- Performance improvements
- Fixed a bug that connection to the Tor network was stuck in "Connecting" state
- Major bugfixes

- Tor updated to v0.3.1.8
- iPhone X support

Engine updates:
- Tor updated to v0.3.1.8 
- Libevent 2.1.8-stable
- OpenSSL 1.1.0f

Tor Engine updates:
- Tor v0.3.3.5-rc 
- OpenSSL 1.1.0g
- iPhone X optimizations

- Fixed a bug that the first website was not loaded
- iPhone X layout optimizations

Onion comes with a fresh new look and includes the following:

- Tor updated to v0.3.5.2-alpha
- OpenSSL update to v1.1.0i
- Libevent updated to v2.1.8
- Liblzma updated to v5.2.3

- Tor updated to v0.3.5.8
- OpenSSL update to v1.1.0i
- Libevent updated to v2.1.8
- Liblzma updated to v5.2.3

- Tor updated to v0.4.0.5
- OpenSSL update to v1.1.0k
- Added iOS 13 support

Updated the following components:
- Tor v0.4.0.6
- Libevent v2.1.11
- OpenSSL v1.1.1d
- Libzma v5.2.4

Updated the following components:
- Tor v0.4.3.5
- Libevent v2.1.11-stable
- OpenSSL v1.1.1g
- Libzma v5.2.5
- Zlib 1.2.11

This update includes support to the new iOS 14 and update to the following core frameworks:
- Tor 0.4.3.6
- libevent 2.1.11
- OpenSSL 1.1.1g
- liblzma 5.2.5
